Serialized Form

  • Package Entities

    • Class Entities.Hall extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • hallClass

          java.lang.String hallClass
          The hall class type of the Hall. (E.g. Silver, Gold, Platinum)

        • hallCode

          java.lang.String hallCode
          The hall code unique to each Hall. Hall Code will be a 3-letter code. (E.g. YHG) The first letter represents the Cineplex the hall belongs to.

        • cineplex

          java.lang.String cineplex
          The Cineplex the Hall is assigned to.

        • capacity

          int capacity
          The maximum seating capacity of the Hall.

        • rows

          int rows
          The number of rows of seats of the Hall.

        • columns

          int columns
          The number of columns of seats of the Hall.

        • classRate

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> classRate
          Class Rates will be stored in a HashMap with Hall Class Type as key and the corresponding rates as key-values. HashMap is used to create unique and non-duplicate key-value entry. 3 Different Keys: Silver/Gold/Platinum. HashMap

    • Class Entities.Movie extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • title

          java.lang.String title
          The title of the movie.

        • showingStatus

          java.lang.String showingStatus
          The showing status of the movie. It can be "COMINGSOON", "PREVIEW", "NOWSHOWING", "ENDOFSHOW"

        • synopsis

          java.lang.String synopsis
          The synopsis of the movie.

        • director

          java.lang.String director
          The director of the movie.

        • cast

          java.lang.String cast
          The casts of the movie. Minimum 2 casts per movie

        • overallRating

          double overallRating
          The overall rating of the movie.

        • ratingList

          java.util.List<E> ratingList
          The List of all the past reviewer's ratings of the movie. List

        • reviewList

          java.util.List<E> reviewList
          The List of all the past reviewer's reviews of the movie. List

        • movieTypeRate

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> movieTypeRate
          Movie Types Rates will be stored in a HashMap with movie type as key and the corresponding rates as key-values. HashMap is used to create unique and non-duplicate key-value entry. HashMap

    • Class Entities.Showtime extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • title

          java.lang.String title
          The title of the movie that is screened for each showtime.

        • showtime

          java.lang.String showtime
          The time of the movie the movie is screened for each showtime.

        • day

          java.lang.String day
          The day of the movie the movie is screened for each showtime.

        • hallCode

          java.lang.String hallCode
          The hallCode of the hall the movie is screened at for each showtime.

        • maxCapacity

          int maxCapacity
          The capacity of the hall the movie is screened at for each showtime.

        • layout

          int[] layout
          Tracks the current layout of each show time to ensure no double booking can occur.

        • dayRate

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> dayRate
          Day Rates will be stored in a HashMap with day type as key and the corresponding rates as key-values. HashMap is used to create unique and non-duplicate key-value entry. 3 Different Keys: weekday/weekend/PH (i.e. public holiday). HashMap

        • PHDays

          java.util.List<E> PHDays
          A List of String objects containing the dates defined as public holiday. List

    • Class Entities.User extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • name

          java.lang.String name
          The name of the user.

        • mobileNumber

          java.lang.String mobileNumber
          The mobileNumber of the user.

        • email

          java.lang.String email
          The email of the user.

        • password

          java.lang.String password
          The password of the user.

        • ageGroup

          java.lang.String ageGroup
          The ageGroup of the user. Can only be Child, Adult, Senior Citizen. To determine the fees applicable to each Customer.

        • user_type

          User.USER_TYPE user_type
          The user type of the object; Customer or Admin.

        • bookingHistory

          java.util.List<E> bookingHistory
          A List of String objects storing the bookingHistory of each User. List

        • userAgeRate

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> userAgeRate
          Rates will be a HashMap with Age Group as key and the corresponding rates as key-values. HashMap is used to create unique and non-duplicate key-value entry 3 Different Groups: Child, Adult, Senior Citizen. HashMap
